articles.title: The Terrific Trio To Be Launched By KJo - News18
articles.description: Karan Johar has announced his newest trio of newcomers, who will be seen in his production ‘Bedhadak’. The newcomers are Shanaya Kapoor, Lakshya Lalwani and Gurfateh Pirzada
articles.content: Gurfateh Pirzada will play the other male lead Angad.
